name: Appeal to Athena
text: Give to the Hercules jugador. When counting [[Gift]] cards you control, you are considered to control none. Acción de Alter ego: Exhaust Hercules o gasta [mental] [mental] → quita this obligation desde el game.

name: Ares
text: Represalia 1. [star] Respuesta obligada: After Ares schemes, inflige yourself 1 facedown encounter card. (Hercules's nemesis Esbirro.)

name: Lernean Hydra
text: Respuesta obligada: After a character you control ataca y damages Lernean Hydra, choose: • gasta a [physical] resource. • Lernean Hydra heals 2 de Daño.

flavor: Hercules has twice thwarted attempts to overthrow Olympus orchestrated by his uncle Pluto y half-brother Ares.
name: Olympic Feud
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: Place 1 additional de Amenaza here for cada [[Olympus]] card in play.

flavor: From kukri to Shi'ar sniper rifles, Ares wields every weapon with equal malice toward all.
name: Ares's Axe
text: Vincula esta carta a Ares. De no ser posible, attach to the villain. [star] Respuesta obligada: After attached enemy ataca, si no friendly character took de Daño from este ataque, descarta esta carta.

name: God of War
text: cada Esbirro ataca the jugador it is engaged with (even si that jugador is in alter-ego form). si no Esbirro se active de este modo, discard cards desde el top of the encounter deck until a Esbirro is discarded y reveal that Esbirro.

name: All Versus All
text: Complicación 2[per_hero]. Respuesta obligada: After a character is defeated, place 2 de Amenaza on this scheme. Cuando se derrote esta carta: Set All Versus All aside.

flavor: "Those who once adored you have turned on you."
name: Hecate
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta/Defeated: Find the All Versus All side scheme y reveal it. [star] Respuesta obligada: After Hecate se active, place 2 de Amenaza sobre All Versus All side scheme.

flavor: "The penalty of death shall be meted out by Kyknos, the son of Ares."
name: Kyknos
text: Represalia 1. Dureza. Victory 0. [star] Respuesta obligada: After Kyknos se active, place 2 de Amenaza sobre All Versus All side scheme. De no ser posible, place 1 de Amenaza sobre el Plan principal.

name: Bewitched Officer
text:
Represalia 1.
[star] Bewitched Officer's ataca ganan Penetrante y ranged.

flavor: Nowhere is safe under the wargospel of All Versus All.
name: Roving Mobs
text: Victory 0. Cuando se derrote esta carta: Find the All Versus All side scheme y reveal it.
